summary: Another preset for CFM for the battlemage/rogue styled dragonborn
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]Categorized Favorites Menu Preset[/size]

[line]
[size=4]Name changes came from my TBSS - The Better Skyrim Sorting mod
Categories - in game appearance [/size]

[size=4]Top Row[/size]
[size=3]Weapons, Apperal, Potions/Poisons, Shouts, Powers[/size]

[size=4]Bottom Row[/size]
[size=3]Destruction, Conjuration, Restoration, Illusion, Alteration[/size][/center][center]
[size=5]Set for Dawnguard, Hearthfires, Dragonborn DLC's[/size]

[line]
[size=5]Check out my other mods [/size][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7719935/?tb=mods&pUp=1]here[/url][/size][/center]
author: SkyrimGamer124
